title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Draymond, Rivera/Wentz Takes, Joe Burrow on Ravens L Bounce Back + NFL Week 6 Best Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Draymond, Rivera/Wentz Takes, Joe Burrow on Ravens L Bounce Back + NFL Week 6 Best Bets
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, Colin gives his final verdict about Draymond Green blasting Jordan Poole with a viral haymaker, and explains why there’s no walking back Commanders HC Ron Rivera’s negative public comments about Carson Wentz.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow on losing a nail biter to AFC North rival Ravens, how he processes and moves past a tough loss, why it’s important for him to look for big play opportunities despite opposing teams specifically game planning to prevent them, why he still has confidence in HC Zac Taylor despite heavy media criticism, if he was surprised that his comments about playing through concussions gained media traction,, what the Bengals are doing well and what they need to improve through 5 weeks, how he would handle a backup QB like Cooper Rush threatening his starting job. Joe also answers some rapid fire questions, including the fiercest competitor he’s faced, the most talented non-Bengals receiver, and the most physically freakish opponent, and which player gets the Burrow stamp of approval for the best fashion sense.

Finally, Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 6 picks are "sharp" or "square" for Ravens/Giants, Bengals/Saints, Cowboys/Eagles, Bills/Chiefs, Niners/Falcons, and Cardinals/Seahawks.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd #volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
